author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Domino's Pizza Says FY Pretax Profit Fell 2 Pct
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Domino’s Pizza Group Plc:
* FINAL DIVIDEND 5.25 PENCEPER SHARE * FY UNDERLYING PROFIT BEFORE TAX ‍96.2​ MILLION STG VERSUS 85.7 MILLION STG AS REPORTED YEAR AGO
* FY SYSTEM SALES 1,179.6 MILLION STG VERSUS 1,004 MILLION STG AS REPORTED YEAR AGO
* AT DEC-END NET DEBT ‍89.2​ MILLION POUNDS VERSUS NET DEBT OF 34.6 MILLION POUNDS AS REPORTED YEAR AGO
* ‍RECOMMENDED FINAL DIVIDEND UP 16.7% TO 5.25P​ * ‍65-75 UK STORE OPENINGS EXPECTED IN 2018​
* ‍UK SYSTEM SALES IN FIRST EIGHT WEEKS OF 2018 UP 10.9%, OR 7.1% LIKE-FOR-LIKE​
* ‍CAPEX FOR 2018 OF AROUND £30M​ * ‍SHARE BUYBACKS OF £50M PLANNED FOR 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
